data.message: Not sure what you all did to the phone apps but, the new notifications system is locking up and bogging down my phone...I am about to delete it because it causes so much interference.

replies.message: Hey Jason. Sorry you're experiencing issues with the notifications. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1scDKRi  -Ryan

Thank you, I just ended up deleting everything to do with Facebook from my phone...now it operates like I just bought it, extremely fast. If I want to get on Facebook from my phone, I just use Google Chrome to access it.
